page.title: 05THE COMMON POUND
page.content: The{Common Pound}at{Ratlinghope,} which was used for keeping stray animals,{is opposite the Manor House.} The walls of the pound are part of the Manor Farm boundary and run along the side of the road. The pound is made of stones joined with mortar.It is shaped like a capital letter "D" on its side with the curved part nearest the road. The back wall is 7.30m long and 2.00m high.It is in good condition.The curved wall has flat stones on top but it is falling down where it joins the back wall and at the gate opening.It is 9.91m long with a gate of 1.04m.The other wall,the flat bottom of the "D",is 5.00m long but is crumbling badly.
